channel.title: ML on Jeff Cavanagh
channel.description: Recent content in ML on Jeff Cavanagh

item.title: Hiking Trail Analysis
item.description: The following was my final project for a Predictive Analytics course. It analyzed data on hiking trails throughout the US and created and compared models predicting whether or not a given trail will be rated above 4.5 stars out of 5. Setup trails=read.csv("AllTrailsdata_nationalpark.csv",header=T) attach(trails) dim(trails) ## [1] 3313 18 This data set gives information on trails in the National Parks Service. The data is publicly available on Kaggle.com.

item.title: Statistical Modeling Starter Kit
item.description: Setup Regression Models Simple Linear Regression Multiple Linear Regression Classification models Logistic Regression Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) Quadratic Discriminant Analysis (QDA) K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) Cross-Validation This post will cover some basic methods of regression analysis and how to apply them in R. It will also serve as a warm-up for the posts that explore more advanced machine learning and AI methods.
